details.title: Winter Wonderland
details.description: Christmas comes to Nottingham with a brand-new ice-rink trail, observation wheel, market stalls, ice bar and your favourite food & beverages.

details.title: Show What I Have - The 1st World Tour
details.description: The 5th generation shooting star,IVE is finally making their touring debut. Catch the girl group in their first world tour, Show What I Have.

details.title: Trilogy
details.description: One of the undisputed biggest acts in electronic music today – ILLENIUM – is bringing his renowned Trilogy concert series to Los Angeles at SoFi Stadium on Friday, February 2, 2024.

details.title: Hyde Park Winter Wonderland
details.description: Experience London's magical winter destination. Enjoy ice skating, rides, food, entertainment and more.

details.title: Tomorrowland Winter
details.description: Tomorrowland returned to Alpe d’Huez in 2023 for the third edition of Tomorrowland Winter.

details.title: Ultra Music Festival
details.description: The world's premier electronic music festival, boasting elite DJs and unparalleled production located in the beautiful city of Miami.

details.title: Creamfields
details.description: 2024 will be no exception as the UK's one and only edition returns to the fields of Cheshire from 22nd - 25th August.

details.title: New Year's Eve Masquerade Ball
details.description: Join us at the renowned London Hotel, The Dorchester, as we bid farewell to the year in extravagant fashion with Luxury London Events.

details.title: OfficialKevents | KPOP & KHIPHOP Night
details.description: Groove to the KPop Beats: Our DJ will spin the hottest K-Pop tracks, from chart-toppers to hidden gems. Get ready to dance the night away to the electrifying beats of your favorite KPop idols.
